channel.title: Client issues
channel.description:
Okay Ihav recently made a webclient it all works jar signed ( works for me) but when my mates go to it it says ' preparing to download cache ' then just quits and says connection error retying in 5 Really quite annoying? got any suggestions that would be appreciated!
Thanks Tom!

item.title: Client issues
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

wrong area…should be in client help.

Did u upload the cache to the url u put in the client?

Read full topic
